analysis.description:
Frozenable.unfreeze (/unique_chucks/2/0x792e0fc822ac6ff5531e46425f13540f1f68a7a8.sol#503-520) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(timestamp <= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/2/0x792e0fc822ac6ff5531e46425f13540f1f68a7a8.sol#505)

Releaseable.release (/unique_chucks/2/0x792e0fc822ac6ff5531e46425f13540f1f68a7a8.sol#536-554) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(timestamp >= createTime && timestamp <= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/2/0x792e0fc822ac6ff5531e46425f13540f1f68a7a8.sol#537)
